availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer. Wayne County native. Son of Charity Van Winkle Sallee and Peter Sallee. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Districts 1 and 6, p. 31. Find A Grave, "John L Sallee (1813-1886)," Memorial #39144640, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=SAL&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=921&GRid=39144640& (accessed April 28, 2017). Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1874), 754.
